definition: to dodge/to duck out of the way/to beat it/shaken (by a fall)/to sprain/to pull a muscle/lightning/spark/a flash/to flash (across one's mind)/to leave behind/(Internet slang) (of a display of affection) "dazzlingly" saccharine

to dodge/to duck out of the way/to beat it/shaken (by a fall)/to sprain/to pull a muscle/lightning/spark/a flash/to flash (across one's mind)/to leave behind/(Internet slang) (of a display of affection) "dazzlingly" saccharine

sentences.english: Bright copper kettles and warm woolen mittens.
sentences.chinese: 亮閃閃的銅壺，手套毛絨絨。

sentences.english: Leaves shudder under their weight before rebounding, and the sidewalk wears a coat of shiny spots.
sentences.chinese: 人行道鋪上了一層亮閃閃的水花。

sentences.english: But when he uncovered it, he saw that it was beautiful shining gold.
sentences.chinese: 可當他弄掉表面的泥土後發現那樹根是亮閃閃的金子。

sentences.english: Leaves shudder under their weight before rebounding, and sidewalk wears a coat of shiny spots.
sentences.chinese: 人行道披上了一層亮閃閃的水點。

sentences.english: She wondered if she dared risk sullying the gleaming sink.
sentences.chinese: 她猶豫了一下，怕把亮閃閃的洗滌槽弄髒。
